mapper.select: select seq,title, content, wdate from (select row_number()over(partition by substr(wdate, 1, 8) order by wdate asc) as rnum, c.seq as seq, c.title as title, c.content as content, c.wdate as wdate from calendar c where user_id=#{user_id} and substr(wdate, 1, 6)=#{wdate}) a where rnum between 1 and 5
mapper.insert: insert into calendar(user_id, title, content, wdate) values(#{user_id},#{title},#{content}, #{wdate})
mapper.select: select seq, title, content, wdate, user_id from calendar where SUBSTRING(wdate, 1, 8) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyymmdd}, 1, 8) AND SUBSTRING(wdate, 9, 4) >= SUBSTRING(#{yyyymmdd}, 9, 4) and user_id=#{id}
